## devices

list all your devices in selected account

### Synopsis

```
List all your devices in selected account.
Examples:
	# list all the devices with selected account
  kl list devices

	# list all the devices with accountId
  kl list devices <accountId>

```

### Options

```bash
  -h, --help   help for devices
```
